title: SML Mahindra Website — Modern Redesign

requirements.text: Design and implement a bold, modern visual theme across the entire site: dark charcoal/steel base palette with vibrant amber/orange accent color, sharp geometric layout, premium sans-serif typography, smooth scroll animations, and subtle gradient or glassmorphism card effects. Apply the theme consistently on all pages.

quotes: it looks a bit old fashioned so i want you to build it advanced a fresh new look

acceptanceCriteria: A cohesive color palette (dark base + amber accent) is used throughout all sections
Typography is modern, legible, and consistent across headings and body text
No outdated design patterns (gradients, drop shadows, or table-based layouts from the early 2000s) are present
Smooth CSS transitions/animations are applied to interactive elements and section reveals

requirements.text: Build a full-width hero section on the homepage with a large background image/gradient, a bold headline about SML Mahindra's commercial vehicle legacy, a short tagline, and two prominent CTA buttons ('Explore Vehicles' and 'Find a Dealer'). Include an animated navigation bar that becomes opaque on scroll.

quotes: build it advanced a fresh new look

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section spans full viewport width and height
Two CTA buttons are visible and functional (scroll to relevant sections)
Navbar is transparent on top, transitions to solid on scroll
Mobile-responsive hamburger menu is present

requirements.text: Create a vehicle catalog section showcasing SML Mahindra's product lineup (buses, trucks, light commercial vehicles). Display vehicles in a responsive grid of modern cards, each showing a vehicle image, name, category tag, and a 'View Details' button. Clicking a card opens a modal or detail view with key specifications.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 6 vehicle cards are displayed in a responsive grid (3 columns on desktop, 1-2 on mobile)
Each card shows image, name, category, and CTA button
Clicking a card opens a modal/drawer with vehicle specs
Filter tabs or dropdown allow filtering by vehicle category

requirements.text: Build a dealer/service locator section where users can enter a city or state name to search for nearby dealers. Display results in a styled list with dealer name, address, phone number, and a 'Get Directions' link. Store dealer data (name, city, state, address, phone) in the backend and expose query functions.
acceptanceCriteria: Search input accepts city or state text and filters backend dealer records
Results list updates dynamically based on input
Each result card shows dealer name, address, phone, and a Google Maps directions link
At least 10 sample dealer entries are pre-seeded in the backend

requirements.text: Add an 'About Us' section highlighting SML Mahindra's history, key milestones, and values. Use a modern timeline layout for milestones and an icon-grid for core values (e.g., Innovation, Reliability, Service).
acceptanceCriteria: Timeline of at least 5 company milestones is displayed with year and description
Core values section uses icons with labels
Section is visually distinct and uses the global design theme

requirements.text: Implement a Contact & Inquiry form that captures the user's name, email, phone number, subject (dropdown: Sales, Service, Dealership, Other), and message. On submission, store the inquiry in the backend and show a success confirmation toast/message.
acceptanceCriteria: All form fields are present and have validation (required fields, email format)
Submission saves the inquiry to backend stable storage
A success toast is shown after successful submission
Form resets after successful submission

requirements.text: Build a sticky footer with SML Mahindra branding, quick navigation links (Home, Vehicles, Dealers, About, Contact), social media icon links, and a copyright notice. Style it with the dark theme and amber accent.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer is present on all views/sections
Quick links scroll to the corresponding sections on the single-page layout
Social media icons are present (LinkedIn, Twitter/X, YouTube as placeholders)
Copyright line is visible

requirements.text: Render all generated images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them throughout the UI (hero background, vehicle cards, about section).
acceptanceCriteria: All images load correctly from frontend/public/assets/generated
No broken image links are present
Images are appropriately sized and display crisply on retina/HD screens

constraints: All backend logic must remain in a single Motoko actor (backend/main.mo)
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
Do not integrate any external maps API or GPS/geolocation service — use static dealer data with a plain text directions link
No real-time features (WebSockets) — use standard React Query polling or on-demand fetch
nonGoals: Real-time inventory or stock data integration
Integration with any third-party CRM or ERP system

Clean studio render of a heavy-duty truck in dark metallic finish on dark background (vehicle-truck.dim_800x500.png)
